item.description:
Inviting all Jewish singles 40+,50+ and 60+

Come to our Singles Shmooze and Shmear Breakfast
Bagels, cream cheese, lox, coffee and conversation

Sunday – March 14,2010 10:00 am-12:00 noon
Temple Beth Am - 300 Pleasant Street – Framingham


Email~ singlesmingle18@aol.com now to make a reservation


DO NOT RSVP to this calendar - you MUST email directly to Jane


Leave your name, your phone number, and number attending

RSVP by March 8, so that we know how many bagels to get!

Cost - $7.00 with a reservation - $9.00 without a reservation/at the door
item.name: Jane Shapiro's Singles Mingle Bagel Breakfast
